doc.after: Dependency grammar is an approach to sentence structure where syntactic units are arranged according to the dependency relation as opposed to the constituency relation of phrase structure grammars Dependencies are directed links between words The finite verb is seen as the root of all clause structure and all the other words in the clause are either directly or indirectly dependent on this root Some prominent dependency based theories of syntax are
